api_list.name: POST /Image
api_list.description: Submit source text and get up to 10 contextually relevant image based on Natural Language Processing (NLP) performed on provided search_text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://texttoimage.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "texttoimage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://texttoimage.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "texttoimage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
